On.Send: AnimBracketStart Beam1 Birth Stand Death ContentPlayOnce

On.Terms: AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom Starport; MorphTo StarportFlying; ScopeContains GroundLocalSelection
AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom StarportFlying; MorphTo Starport; ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat; HasStatus FlyerHelper

AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom BarracksFlying; MorphTo Barracks; ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat; HasStatus FlyerHelper
AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom Factory; MorphTo FactoryFlying; ScopeContains GroundLocalSelection
AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom FactoryFlying; MorphTo Factory; ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat; HasStatus FlyerHelper

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant

On.Terms: AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom GhostAcademy; MorphTo GhostAcademyFlying; ScopeContains GroundLocalSelection
AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom GhostAcademyFlying; MorphTo GhostAcademy; ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat; HasStatus FlyerHelper
